title: "Advanced R---Overview"
---

The Advanced R course comprises the following modules.

1. [Coding conventions](https://decisionmechanics.quarto.pub/advanced-r-coding-conventions)
2. [Functional programming](https://decisionmechanics.quarto.pub/advanced-r-functional-programming)
3. [Object-oriented programming](https://decisionmechanics.quarto.pub/advanced-r-oop)
4. [Debugging](https://decisionmechanics.quarto.pub/advanced-r-debugging)
5. [Testing](https://decisionmechanics.quarto.pub/advanced-r-testing)
6. [Efficient code](https://decisionmechanics.quarto.pub/advanced-r-efficient-code)
7. [Reporting](https://decisionmechanics.quarto.pub/advanced-r-reporting)
8. [Packages](https://decisionmechanics.quarto.pub/advanced-r-packages)
9. [Reproducible workflows](https://decisionmechanics.quarto.pub/advanced-r-reproducible-workflows)
